item.title: Week 1: Starting a Model
item.description: I will be using the visualization customization extension for this blog post and will use the resulting data to make a prediction about the upcoming 2022 midterm election. For my analysis, Iâ€™m picking the year 2016 since it is the most recent midterm year from the 114th Congress. Also, I am using a custom theme that replicates 538 theme that I found on GitHub. The source is linked at: https://github.
